title: Battlelust card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Battlelust card increases a player's deadliness. *Power level 0: Acts as a [[potion of might]] with a random power up to (power / 4) - 1. *Power level 1: Sets the player's "building rage" timer to 1. *Power level 2: Sets the player's temporary "slaying" buff to a random duration of up to (power / 6) turns. ==History== The Battlelust card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] before it was removed in [[0.15]]. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of changes|Changes]]
